```{python}
#what is a dataframe
df = pd.DataFrame(
{"a" : [4 ,5, 6],
"b" : [7, 8, 9],
"c" : [10, 11, 12]},
index = [1, 2, 3])
print(df)
```

```{python}
# %% #alternative df with np.array()
df = pd.DataFrame(np.array(((
  [4 ,5, 6],
  [7, 8, 9],
  [10, 11, 12]))),
  index=[1, 2, 3],
  columns=['a','b','c'])
df
```

```{python}
#use of filter and query
df
(df.rename(columns = {'a':'duck'})
  .filter(['duck', 'b'])
  .query('b < 9')
  .duck
  .min()
)
```
